description: Manchester United: Ask questions of Simon Stone
title: Manchester United: Ask questions of Simon Stone
title_page: Manchester United: Ask questions of Simon Stone - BBC Sport
maintext:
BBC Sport's Simon Stone has been following Manchester United on their pre-season tour of the United States - and he's ready to answer your burning questions about the Red Devils.
Ask whatever you would like to know and we will put a selection before Simon so he can give his insider take.
